bot_generic_error: Something went wrong, and the error has been logged.
bot_no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command.
bot_botspam_redirect: This command is disabled here! Please try using it in <#%s>.
commands_disable_list: All disabled commands in this channel: %s
commands_disable_none: No disabled commands in this channel.
commands_template_role_not_found: Couldn't find this role, setting it to none.
commands_template_channel_not_found: Couldn't find this channel, setting it to none.
commands_template_member_not_found: Couldn't find this member, setting it to none.
commands_cooldowns_bad_syntax: Please specify channel- or member-specific cooldowns.
template_sub_no_sub_commands: No subcommands for this command group.
help_instruction: Use `%shelp <name>` to find out more about a specific command.
help_footer: **Note**: Do not include `[]` or `<>` when using commands. They are there to differ between actual text and things you should replace.
help_cmd_shardinfo_desc: Shows information on the shards of the bot.
help_cmd_invite_desc: Returns a link you can use to invite the bot to your server.
help_cmd_ping_desc: Returns the time between when the bot received your message and the bot's message being sent.
help_cmd_pong_desc: Returns the last heartbeat latency measure.
help_cmd_usage_desc: Shows how many times each command has been used on your server.
help_cmd_usage_args_0: `all`: *optional* show usage for the entire bot.
